body_html:
OK, I dug in a little more and found out that flatc was generated under /bazel-out/host/bin/external/flatbuffers/flatc

What is the general guideline in tensorflow regarding install location of host tools? The above path seems like a temporary output place, not the "final" location for flatc.

I can easily change the patch to point to the above location instead of third_party/flatbuffers/flatc. Just want to make sure this is the right thing to do. Let me know.

@Johnson145 @petewarden

@Johnson145 @petewarden
body:
OK, I dug in a little more and found out that flatc was generated under <tensorflow>/bazel-out/host/bin/external/flatbuffers/flatc

What is the general guideline in tensorflow regarding install location of host tools?  The above path seems like a temporary output place, not the "final" location for flatc.

I can easily change the patch to point to the above location instead of third_party/flatbuffers/flatc.  Just want to make sure this is the right thing to do.   Let me know.

@Johnson145 @petewarden
